title: Fivetran dbt deployment.yml file
description: Describes the jobs that enable Fivetran to run your dbt commands on a schedule

dbtVersion.description:
Choose the version of dbt that will run the project. Supported versions are listed in https://fivetran.com/docs/transformations/dbt/setup-guide#prerequisites.
 If the version is not specified, dbt 0.18.0 will be used.

name.description: Unique name of the job. The name will be displayed in the Fivetran dashboard once your jobs are imported.

targetName.description: The name of the target that will be used when running the job. If it's not specified, the target will be named 'prod'.

schedule.description: When this job should run in cron format. For help with cron formatting, visit https://crontab.guru.

name.description: Give each step a unique name. The name will be displayed in the Fivetran dashboard. Step names must be unique.

command.description:
The dbt command that should run in this step.
For a list of available commands visit https://docs.getdbt.com/reference/model-selection-syntax.

anyOf.description: Executes all of the models in the dependency graph.
Load data from csv files into your data warehouse.
Execute snapshots defined in your project.
List the resources in your project.
Generates executable SQL from source model, test, and analysis files.
